channel.title: Athena on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Athena on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Building HDB Agent
item.description: Discover how I built HDB Agent, an AI-driven system leveraging AWS Bedrock AgentCore, Lambda, and Athena to analyze Singapore’s HDB resale market. The architecture combines serverless, event-driven design with hybrid infrastructure—integrating S3, RDS Aurora, and CloudFormation for modular deployment. Intelligent query routing directs requests to the most efficient backend—XGBoost for price prediction, Athena for analytics, PostgreSQL MCP for comparisons, and Bedrock LLMs for contextual insights—creating a powerful, scalable, and cost-efficient agentic AI solution.
